ComicInfo.Title: GN
ComicInfo.Summary:
By Ron Wilber; three stories in one 68-page volume! Stacked, gorgeous and able to kick your ass at the drop of a nightstick, the Bondage Cop is a stern and domineering force for justice in this "tongue-in-chick" send-up of crime and sci-fi stories!
Back BlurbShot and killed while on duty, plain-jane Cyndi Simon is taken by a mysterious alien and transformed into the blonde, curvaceous force for goodness, justice, and all things American -- THE BONDAGE COP!
Powered by sexual energy, the Bondage Cop patrols Liberty City as a stern and punishing force for justice, dominating evil-doers as she ensnares criminals with her super-powers, seduces her fellow copys by the handful, and makes her home a safe place to live through sheer force of will.
But when aliens from another galaxy invade Earth, the Bondage Cop's going to need all the sexual energy she can get to defeat them. And can even out dauntless heroine save the future when the aliens attack the past?
Ron Wilber the creator of EROS favorites Domino Lady, Bondage Girls at War, and Hell's Mistress returns with this all-original X-rated new graphic novel of passion, punishment, and the many uses to which a nightstick can be put!
